name: Magic Guide
description: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

passiveDescription.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>12%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.1: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>15%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.2: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>18%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>21%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>24%</cryo>.
